languages.text: "О чем вы, Вольный Торговец? Я отчетливо помню каждый ваш приказ. И друкари тоже помню. Я провел с этими ксеносами достаточно времени, чтобы никогда не забывать..." {n}Голос Ахиллеаса звенит и срывается.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "О чем вы, Вольный Торговец? Я отчетливо помню каждый ваш приказ. И друкари тоже помню. Я провел с этими ксеносами достаточно времени, чтобы никогда не забывать..."
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Ahileas

languages.text: "What are you talking about, Rogue Trader? I distinctly remember each of your orders. I remember the Drukhari too. I spent enough time with these xenos to never forget..." {n}Achilleas's voice rises to a feverish pitch and breaks off.{/n}
languages.original_text: "О чем вы, Вольный Торговец? Я отчетливо помню каждый ваш приказ. И друкари тоже помню. Я провел с этими ксеносами достаточно времени, чтобы никогда не забывать..." {n}Голос Ахиллеаса звенит и срывается.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "What are you talking about, Rogue Trader? I distinctly remember each of your orders. I remember the Drukhari too. I spent enough time with these xenos to never forget..." {n}Achilleas's voice rises to a feverish pitch and breaks off.{/n}
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Ahileas

traits.locale_text: "What are you talking about, Rogue Trader? I distinctly remember each of your orders. I remember the Drukhari too. I spent enough time with these xenos to never forget..." {n}Achilleas's voice rises to a feverish pitch and breaks off.{/n}
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Ahileas

languages.text: « Qu'est-ce que vous racontez, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande} ? Je me souviens parfaitement de chacun de vos ordres. Je me souviens aussi des Drukharis. J'ai passé suffisamment de temps avec ces xénos pour ne jamais les oublier... » {n}La voix d'Achilleas monte fébrilement dans les aigus puis se brise.{/n}
languages.original_text: "What are you talking about, Rogue Trader? I distinctly remember each of your orders. I remember the Drukhari too. I spent enough time with these xenos to never forget..." {n}Achilleas's voice rises to a feverish pitch and breaks off.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Qu'est-ce que vous racontez, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande} ? Je me souviens parfaitement de chacun de vos ordres. Je me souviens aussi des Drukharis. J'ai passé suffisamment de temps avec ces xénos pour ne jamais les oublier... » {n}La voix d'Achilleas monte fébrilement dans les aigus puis se brise.{/n}
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Ahileas

languages.text: “您这是在说什么啊，行商浪人？我很清楚地记得您的每个命令，也记得那些黑暗灵族。我花了很多时间和那些异形独处，这一切我怎么可能忘得掉……”{n}阿吉里亚斯猛地抬高了音调，仿佛发狂一般，随后戛然而止。{/n}
languages.original_text: "What are you talking about, Rogue Trader? I distinctly remember each of your orders. I remember the Drukhari too. I spent enough time with these xenos to never forget..." {n}Achilleas's voice rises to a feverish pitch and breaks off.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “您这是在说什么啊，行商浪人？我很清楚地记得您的每个命令，也记得那些黑暗灵族。我花了很多时间和那些异形独处，这一切我怎么可能忘得掉……”{n}阿吉里亚斯猛地抬高了音调，仿佛发狂一般，随后戛然而止。{/n}
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Ahileas

languages.text: 「何を言っているのですか、自由開拓者。あなたの命令は全て覚えていますよ。デュカーリのこともね。この異種族たちとは、忘れられないほどの時間を過ごしたのですから…」{n}アキレアスの声が熱を帯び、途切れた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "What are you talking about, Rogue Trader? I distinctly remember each of your orders. I remember the Drukhari too. I spent enough time with these xenos to never forget..." {n}Achilleas's voice rises to a feverish pitch and breaks off.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「何を言っているのですか、自由開拓者。あなたの命令は全て覚えていますよ。デュカーリのこともね。この異種族たちとは、忘れられないほどの時間を過ごしたのですから…」{n}アキレアスの声が熱を帯び、途切れた。{/n}
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Ahileas

languages.text: "Wovon sprecht Ihr, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}? Ich erinnere mich ganz genau an jeden Eurer Befehle. Ich erinnere mich auch an die Drukhari. Ich verbrachte lange genug mit diesen Xenos, das würde niemand vergessen ..." {n}Achilleas' Stimme steigt zu einem schrillen Ton an und bricht ab.{/n}
languages.original_text: "What are you talking about, Rogue Trader? I distinctly remember each of your orders. I remember the Drukhari too. I spent enough time with these xenos to never forget..." {n}Achilleas's voice rises to a feverish pitch and breaks off.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Wovon sprecht Ihr, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}? Ich erinnere mich ganz genau an jeden Eurer Befehle. Ich erinnere mich auch an die Drukhari. Ich verbrachte lange genug mit diesen Xenos, das würde niemand vergessen ..." {n}Achilleas' Stimme erhebt sich in fiebrige Tonhöhe und bricht ab.{/n}
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Ahileas

languages.text: «¿De qué está hablando, Comerciante Independiente? Recuerdo perfectamente todas sus órdenes. También recuerdo a los Drukhari. Pasé demasiado tiempo en su compañía como para olvidarlos...». {n}Achilleas habla en un tono cada vez más agudo y frenético hasta que se interrumpe.{/n}
languages.original_text: "What are you talking about, Rogue Trader? I distinctly remember each of your orders. I remember the Drukhari too. I spent enough time with these xenos to never forget..." {n}Achilleas's voice rises to a feverish pitch and breaks off.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¿De qué está hablando, Comerciante Independiente? Recuerdo perfectamente todas sus órdenes. También recuerdo a los Drukhari. Pasé demasiado tiempo en su compañía como para olvidarlos...». {n}Achilleas habla en un tono cada vez más agudo y frenético hasta que finalmente su voz se quiebra.{/n}
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Ahileas

languages.text: "Siz neyden bahsediyorsunuz Hür Tacir? Verdiğiniz tüm emirleri net bir şekilde hatırlıyorum. Drukharileri de hatırlıyorum. O zenolarla o kadar çok zaman geçirdim ki aklımdan çıkmaları..." {n}Achilleas'ın sesi ateşlenerek yükseliyor, ardından kesiliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "What are you talking about, Rogue Trader? I distinctly remember each of your orders. I remember the Drukhari too. I spent enough time with these xenos to never forget..." {n}Achilleas's voice rises to a feverish pitch and breaks off.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Siz neyden bahsediyorsunuz Hür Tacir? Verdiğiniz tüm emirleri net bir şekilde hatırlıyorum. Drukharileri de hatırlıyorum. O zenolarla o kadar çok zaman geçirdim ki aklımdan çıkmaları..." {n}Achilleas'ın sesi ateşli bir şekilde yükseliyor ve ardından kesiliyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Ahileas
